DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to investigate the effect of metformin on the correlation between hyperinsulinemia and hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Metformin on the Correlation Between Hyperinsulinemia and Hypertension
DOC.criteria: 20 to 65 years of age, regardless of sex duration of hypertension was <5 years overweight or obesity, mild to moderate hypertension, receive no euglycemic agent or antiobesity drug
